B

blocked - Static variable in class projectWebShop.model.Users_
 
blockOrUnblock(String) - Method in class projectWebShop.controller.ShopFacade
Finds the specified user in the database and sets the value of the blocked-variable for that user to the opposite of the current value, either true or false.
blockOrUnblock(Users) - Method in class projectWebShop.view.ShopManager
Calls the method in the controller to block or unblock the specified user.
browse() - Method in class projectWebShop.controller.ShopFacade
Collects all rows from the Inventory table in the databse and inserts them into a list.
browse() - Method in class projectWebShop.view.ShopManager
Calls the browse method in the controller which returns a list with all items currently in the database
buy() - Method in class projectWebShop.controller.ShopFacade
Loops through the list containing the items in the shopping cart and gets each corresponding item from the Inventory table in the database.
buy() - Method in class projectWebShop.view.ShopManager
Calls the buy method in the controller that returns the shopping cart equal to null.
